news.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
news.summary: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%. Economists polled by Dow Jones expect the rate to be the same as in October.

news.title: Trump Media announces $6 billion merger with fusion company TAE Technologies; DJT stock soars 25%
news.summary: Trump Media and Technology Group announced a merger agreement with fusion power company TAE Technologies. The deal is valued at more than $6 billion.

news.title: Eli Lilly says obesity pill helps maintain weight loss after patients switch from Wegovy, Zepbound
news.summary: Eli Lilly also said it has filed for Food and Drug Administration approval of the daily GLP-1 pill, called orforglipron, for obesity.

news.title: Chipotle chases the protein craze with new menu items — including meat in a cup
news.summary: Chipotle is launching a high-protein snack menu, including a new protein cup. The chain is looking to revive demand amid slowing sales and shifting eating habits.

news.title: Health care is the 'engine' of the job market — and that's risky for the economy
news.summary: Health care is a bright spot in the cooling job market. However, that poses risks to the economy if the sector falters. Health care is one of the few areas of growth in the U.S.

news.title: From on-device AI to the ‘girlfriend index,’ trading ideas from the research firm that nailed 2025’s investment themes
news.summary: Citrini Research nailed many investment themes for 2025. Here are a handful of ideas they see delivering potential in 2026. Citrini has a number of ideas that could be big winners in the coming years.

news.title: Flu season is ‘early’ and ‘aggressive’ in New York City. Here’s what that means for the rest of the country.
news.summary: A new variant called H3N2 subclade K is causing most of the illness this season. The new strain is a strain of H3n2 that has never been seen before.

news.title: Fear of losing your job is no way to get employees on board with AI
news.summary: Companies want workers to embrace AI, but a hardline ultimatum will backfire, experts say. Companies want to make it easier for workers to work with AI, they say.

news.title: Why Trump Media is getting into the nuclear business with $6 billion TAE deal
news.summary: Trump Media’s stock is soaring as the Truth Social operator looks to get in on a hot AI power trend. Trump Media is a division of Trump Communications.

news.title: The next year will be for stock picking — and the next two weeks should see gains, says Goldman Sachs
news.summary: Goldman Sachs says stocks won’t be tugging the same way next year. One interpretation of options market pricing by Goldman Sachs.
